mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.act_id AS "actId", a.biz_id AS "bizId"
mapper.select:
SELECT re.id re_id, act.id act_id, act.`key` act_key, act.`name` act_name, act.proc_def_id act_proc_def_id, act.group_id act_group_id, biz.id biz_id, biz.`key` biz_key, biz.`name` biz_name, biz.group_id biz_group_id FROM wy_re_biz_act re LEFT JOIN wy_act_def act ON re.act_id = act.id LEFT JOIN wy_biz_def biz ON re.biz_id = biz.id
AND act.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wyReBizAct.wyActDef.name},'%')
AND biz.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wyReBizAct.wyBizDef.name},'%')

SELECT re.id re_id, act.id act_id, act.`key` act_key, act.`name` act_name, act.proc_def_id act_proc_def_id, act.group_id act_group_id, biz.id biz_id, biz.`key` biz_key, biz.`name` biz_name, biz.group_id biz_group_id FROM wy_re_biz_act re LEFT JOIN wy_act_def act ON re.act_id = act.id LEFT JOIN wy_biz_def biz ON re.biz_id = biz.id
AND act.proc_def_id = #{procDefinitionId}
